generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees, with pedestrians walking on them.
- building: Buildings line both sides of the street, with windows, storefronts, and architectural features visible.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalks and in the middle of the street, forming a green canopy.
- sky: A gray, overcast sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalks, and a person is riding a bicycle on the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the road, fitting the definition of a rider.
- car: Multiple cars are visible, including a red car directly in front and a black car to the right.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections, including one showing red on the right side of the image.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other utility poles are visible throughout the scene.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a yellow sign with text on the right side of the street.
